p.d: The term legend is tossed around all too often, but it certainly applies to Ronnie James Dio, who during an unparralled career has fronted such influential acts as Elf, Rainbow, Black Sabbath, and Dio. Evil or Divine was shot in New York City at Roseland Ballroom at the end of 2002 in front of a sold out audience. The programme features all of the classic Dio tracks like, "Holy Diver", "Rainbow in The dark", and "Last In Line" as well as tracks from "Killing The Dragon".
